name: Extreme Toro (2014 New Release)
additionalNotes: The Hype: This one is all power. A brand new release, CAO Extreme features a bold, exciting blend of Honduran and Nicaraguan ligeros from Esteli and La Entrada for filler, with a rich Nicaraguan binder and a dark and oily Ecuador Habano ligero wrapper on the outside. Rich and hearty notes of toasty tobacco, spices, black pepper, charred oak, nuts, and espresso combine in an unforgettable experience that gradually builds in intensity. Itâ€™s strong, yet balanced.
